text:
Hey, do you think you can find a solution to my problem?

I keep running out of space to store the bugs I get from Sierra, before I can turn them into fish food and fish with them.

I don't know what would be a good solution. Can you talk to Sierra?
uponCompletion:
Well, I usually just keep the bugs in the shed with the rest of the fiber.

As soon as you clear it out, I just grab all the bugs and give them to McCoy.

Maybe Malu has a better idea?
